item.title: Android Keypad Tones, A Perfect BlueBox!
item.description: Hi, I recently found that keypad tones from android devices can act as a perfect phone phreaking blue box. In Simple Terms: Feed in Equivalent Calling tones to the Mic of the Land Line from Android, this will allow you to call the number for whom the tones are generated for However, for some devices like Samsung and others, may not generate the same tones. However, for those devices, we can simply install ToneDef Application from Google Playstore for free.
